00014 class Maze * MazeGame::CreateMaze(class MazeFactory * factory) {
00015         Maze * aMaze; aMaze = factory->MakeMaze();
00016         Room * r1; r1 = factory->MakeRoom(1);
00017         Room * r2; r2 = factory->MakeRoom(2);
00018         Door * theDoor; theDoor = factory->MakeDoor(r1,r2);
00019         
00020         aMaze->AddRoom(r1);
00021         aMaze->AddRoom(r2);
00022         
00023         r1->SetSide(North, factory->MakeWall());
00024         r1->SetSide(East, theDoor);
00025         r1->SetSide(South, factory->MakeWall());
00026         r1->SetSide(West, factory->MakeWall());
00027         
00028         r2->SetSide(North, factory->MakeWall());
00029         r2->SetSide(East, factory->MakeWall());
00030         r2->SetSide(South, factory->MakeWall());
00031         r2->SetSide(West, theDoor);
00032         
00033         return aMaze;
00034 }
